trans-unit.source: Stores an ordered pair of integers, which specify a <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height*> and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width*>.
trans-unit.target: Armazena um par ordenado de números inteiros, especifique um <> </> *> e <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: The Size class is used to specify a height and width through the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Size%2A> property for <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>, <xref:System.Drawing.RectangleF>, <xref:System.Drawing.Image>, <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> and other graphics classes.
trans-unit.target: A classe de tamanho é usada para especificar uma altura e largura por meio de <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Size%2A>propriedade <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>, <xref:System.Drawing.RectangleF>, <xref:System.Drawing.Image>, <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>e outras classes de elementos gráficos.</xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Drawing.Image> </xref:System.Drawing.RectangleF> </xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> </xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can perform operations on a Size by using the overloaded operators such as <xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Addition%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Subtraction%2A>, and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Equality%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode executar operações em um tamanho usando os operadores sobrecarregados como <xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Addition%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Subtraction%2A>e <xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Equality%2A>.</xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Equality%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Subtraction%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Addition%2A>

trans-unit.source: The unit for the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> of the Size structure depend on the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A> settings for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is used to draw.
trans-unit.target: A unidade para o <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A>e <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A>do tamanho da estrutura dependem de <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A>e <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A>configurações para o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objeto que é usado para desenhar.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: You should avoid depending on GetHashCode for unique values, as two <xref:System.Drawing.Size> objects with the same values for their <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> properties may return the same hash code.
trans-unit.target: Você deve evitar dependendo GetHashCode para valores exclusivos, como dois <xref:System.Drawing.Size>objetos com os mesmos valores para seus <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A>e <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A>Propriedades podem retornar o mesmo código de hash.</xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size>
